MenuItem.Name: Define Device + States / Variable to be tracked

Field.Label:
add devcies/states/varaiables to be tracked 1. select device and state 2. then select which time window and which measure should be tracked.
Then the plugin will create variables: deviceName__stateName__timeWindow_Measurement eg: Hue_light_0_48_Küche_ceiling_1__redLevel__thisHour_Count1 Hue_light_0_48_Küche_ceiling_1__redLevel__last7Days_End s-11-govee-mini__Temperature__thisHour_Ave
... and don't forget to select measurements and click on SAVE at the BOTTOM (scroll down)

Field.tooltip: you have to click on your choice to signal your entry
Field.Label: Select Device/variable:

Field.tooltip: This will confirm Device/State variable selection
Field.Label: dev/state/variable:
Field.Title: SELECT

Field.Label: Use shortName for generated tracking variable instead of device_state_xxx (no spaces):
==>Now select the measures you like to track for specified dev/state/var. THEN click <SAVE> at the VERY-VERY bottom:

MenuItem.Name: Remove Device + States / Variable from tracking

Field.tooltip: you have to click on your choice to signal your entry
